entries.name: Ruby
entries.comment: Fell in love with it in my teenage years, it's a daily ever since.

entries.name: JavaScript & TypeScript
entries.comment: Started in the jQuery / Mootools era and followed along the insane rise of this language.

entries.name: Go
entries.comment: A fairly recent discovery, it's an awesome language to build microservices.

entries.name: Ruby on Rails
entries.comment: Obviously being a Ruby enthusiast, every single company I've worked at had a Rails monolith.

entries.name: Hanami
entries.comment: I love what they did in version 2, an amazing framework for Ruby microservices.

entries.name: React
entries.comment: Briefly worked with Vue which is cool as well.

entries.name: Node.js & Express
entries.comment: It used to be a daily, I've built complex services with this two.

entries.name: tailwindcss
entries.comment: All my personal projects includes it, I love tailwind to death.

entries.name: AWS
entries.comment: in most my jobs we started with Heroku and ended up on AWS.

entries.name: Redis
entries.comment: believe it or not, I worked on projects were this was the main DB.
